meanings.definition: Familiar or knowledgeable about a particular subject or activity.
meanings.sent1: She is conversant with the latest trends in technology.
meanings.sent2: He became conversant with the rules of the game after practicing.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed conversant with the art of catching mice effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library, conversant with the stories of old.
meanings.sent5: The wise owl was conversant with the secrets of the forest.

meanings.definition: Able to talk or engage in conversation.
meanings.sent1: The toddler is becoming more conversant as she learns new words.
meanings.sent2: Being conversant is essential for effective communication.
meanings.sent3: The parrot was surprisingly conversant, mimicking human speech perfectly.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were so expressive, they were conversant even without words.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed, its gentle murmur conversant with the trees around it.
